properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 5 at 3:39AM PST until January 6 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. 5 to 10 inches of snow today
followed by 8 to 16 inches late tonight through Monday morning.

* WHERE...South Washington Cascades.

* WHEN...Through Noon Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST MONDAY
